network.title: No connection
network.message: It looks like you've lost your internet connection. Check your connection and try again.

timeout.title: Server not responding
timeout.message: The AI server is slow right now. Try again in a moment.

rateLimit.title: Too many messages
rateLimit.message: You're sending messages a bit too fast. Wait a moment and try again.

serverError.title: Temporary problem
serverError.message: The AI server has a temporary problem. Try again in a moment.

authError.title: Login error
authError.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

modelUnavailable.title: Model unavailable
modelUnavailable.message: The selected AI model is not available right now. Try choosing a different model.

badRequest.title: Something went wrong
badRequest.message: There was a problem with your message. Try rephrasing and send again.

unknown.title: Unexpected error
unknown.message: An unexpected error occurred. Try again, or contact your teacher if the problem continues.

balance.tooltip: The balance is paid by EDB Pede. The chatbot will stop working when the balance reaches 0 DKK.

auth.title: Student Feedback Bot
auth.description: Enter the password to access the feedback system.

chat.welcomeMessage: Upload your assignment and ask for feedback.
chat.connectionFailedFinal: Connection failed after 10 attempts. Try a different AI model, or click 'Try again'.

fileUpload.errorUnsupportedType: Only DOCX and PDF files are supported.
fileUpload.errorFileTooLarge: File size must be less than 10MB.

welcome.title: Welcome to Feedback Bot!
welcome.description: I'll help you get feedback on your schoolwork. Let's start by gathering some information.

privacy.title: Important before you share your text
privacy.line1: Don't use your real name – write e.g. "Emma" or "Ali" instead
privacy.line2: Avoid private information about health or illness

subjectGrade.title: Which subject and grade?
subjectGrade.description: Select your subject and grade so I can tailor my feedback

assignment.title: What is your assignment description?
assignment.placeholder: Copy the assignment description or describe it in your own words...
assignment.hint: E.g.: "Write an analysis of H.C. Andersen's 'The Little Mermaid'"

studentWork.title: Show me your assignment
studentWork.hint: Share what you've been working on – upload a file or write your draft below

gradePreference.title: Do you want an indicative grade?
gradePreference.hint: An indicative grade is just an estimate – your teacher gives the final grade
gradePreference.yes: Yes, give me an indicative grade

modelSelection.title: Choose your AI model
modelSelection.description: Select which AI model will provide your feedback

privacy.title: Your data is protected
privacy.subtitle: All models run in secure hardware environments

encrypted.title: Encrypted processing
encrypted.description: Data stays encrypted even during AI processing

hardware.title: Hardware protection
hardware.description: No one can access - not even the cloud provider

details.teeExplanation: These AI models run in Trusted Execution Environments (TEE), which means your data stays encrypted even while being processed - not just during transmission. This hardware-level protection ensures that no one, including the cloud provider, can access your conversations.
details.performance: Minimal performance impact (~100ms) with maximum security
details.verification: Cryptographic verification ensures your data was processed securely

modelSelection.commercialWarning: You've selected commercial AI models. After this setup, we will check your text for personal information and anonymize it before sending to the AI model.

deepseek.name: DeepSeek V3.2
deepseek.description: Understands complex tasks and gives thorough answers. Great at explaining things step by step.

gptoss.name: GPT-OSS 120B
gptoss.description: Strong at writing and analyzing texts. Helps you structure your thoughts.

glm.name: GLM-4.6
glm.description: The newest model with fast responses. Can remember a lot of your conversation.

qwen.name: Qwen3 480B A35B
qwen.description: A strong and versatile model that handles many types of tasks. Great at following instructions precisely.

gemma.name: Gemma 3 27B
gemma.description: Google's multilingual model with excellent language understanding. Supports 140+ languages and long documents.

gpt5.name: GPT-5.1
gpt5.description: OpenAI's latest and most advanced model. Exceptional for complex tasks and nuanced feedback.

grok.name: Grok 4.1 Fast
grok.description: xAI's fast model with 2M context. Perfect for long texts and quick responses.

gemini3.name: Gemini 3 Pro
gemini3.description: Google's latest Pro model with multimodal understanding. Strong at analysis and creative writing.

claude.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
claude.description: Anthropic's top model with exceptional language understanding. Excellent for nuanced feedback and dialogue.

modelPath.title: Choose your AI experience
modelPath.description: Select between privacy and quality based on your needs

detecting.title: Checking for personal information...
detecting.description: We're scanning your text to protect your privacy

review.title: We found personal information
review.description: The following information will be anonymized before being sent to the AI model

verification.title: Verifying your text...
verification.description: We're verifying that personal information has been removed

falsePositive.title: Tell us more
falsePositive.placeholder: Explain why this flag is incorrect...

selectiveKeep.title: Select what to keep
selectiveKeep.description: Select the items you want to keep in your text

warning.title: Warning: Personal information
warning.description: You've chosen to keep personal information in your text. This may pose a risk to your privacy.

error.title: An error occurred
error.description: Could not check for personal information. Please try again.
